casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vonderick LANGLEY. No. 535P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2005. Lemuel W. Hinton, for Vonderick Langley. Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of September 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of September 2005."
